subject: Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Terry Wallace, the race caller for 37 years at Oaklawn Park, in Hot Springs, Ark., said he was leaving the announcer booth before the next racing season at Oaklawn begins in January.
snippet: Terry Wallace, the race caller for 37 years at Oaklawn Park, in Hot Springs, Ark., said he was leaving the announcer booth before the next racing season at Oaklawn begins in January.
